Attack - Class in com.tloj.game.game
An abstract class that represents an attack in the game.
Attacks are actions that can be performed by CombatEntities.
They can be used to deal damage to other CombatEntities.
This design respects modularity and scalability, as the action of the attack is its own class that encapsulates different data like
the attacker, target and all different damages/defenses and allows for complex attack mechanics in the game to coexist.
Attack(CombatEntity, CombatEntity) - Constructor for class com.tloj.game.game.Attack

AttackElixir - Class in com.tloj.game.collectables.items
Represents the Consumable Item "Attack Elixir" in the game.
The Attack Elixir can boost the attack stat of the player of 4 for the duration of a fight, it can be found or purchased in the game.
It weighs 0.2, with an in game cost of 15

Class to represent the BasePlayer class in the game
It has the following fixed initial attributes:

15 mana points
3 attack points
3 defense points
5 maximum weight capacity
10 money
It has the Focus ability

Character - Class in com.tloj.game.entities
Abstract class to represent a character in the game.
A Character is a moving entity that can engage in combat with Mobs and interact with NPCs.
It is controlled by the user.

CharacterObserver - Interface in com.tloj.game.game
An interface that represents an observer of the game's characters.
A class extending this interface can register itself as an observer and receive notifications from the Character object
CharacterSkill - Class in com.tloj.game.skills
Abstract class for character skill used during combat
As with the BossAbility class, this class applies an adaptation of the Strategy pattern to the character skills, allowing for easy addition of new skills.
This class is meant to be extended by specific character skills, guaranteeing modularity.
CharacterSkill(Character) - Constructor for class com.tloj.game.skills.CharacterSkill
Constructs a CharacterSkill object with the given character.
CharacterSkill(Character, int) - Constructor for class com.tloj.game.skills.CharacterSkill

CombatEntity - Class in com.tloj.game.entities
An abstract class representing an entity that can either attack and be attacked
This includes the Character (the player), the Mobs and the Bosses
All combat entities have a health pool, an attack stat and a defense stat
CombatEntity(int, int, int, Coordinates) - Constructor for class com.tloj.game.entities.CombatEntity
 
ConsoleHandler - Class in com.tloj.game.utilities
Utility class to handle console operations, such as:
- Set console encoding to UTF-8
- Clear console
- Escape codes for text colors
Constants - Class in com.tloj.game.utilities
This class contains all the constants used in the game.
ASCII art, story text and music file paths are stored here.

Controller - Class in com.tloj.game.game
Controller façade class to handle the game state and user input
It uses the Singleton pattern to ensure only one instance of the Controller class is created
It uses the Command pattern to handle the different game commands
It uses the Factory pattern to create different Characters based on the user's choice

Dice - Class in com.tloj.game.game
Represents a dice in the game
A dice is a random number generator with a minimum and maximum value
The dice can be rolled to get a random number between the minimum and maximum values

DiceReroller - Class in com.tloj.game.collectables.weaponeffects

This effect has a 70% probability to apply.
It is paired with the Nano Dirk

levelUp() - Method in class com.tloj.game.entities.Character
Level up the character when it has enough xp points (15 * its current level).
The required xp is then increased for each level.
Hp and mana are increased by rolling a 5-sided dice, attack and defense are increased by rolling a 3-sided dice.
The character is completely healed and its mana entirely restored.
levelUp(int) - Method in class com.tloj.game.entities.Mob
The level up factor for the mobs.
To ensure game balancement it must differ for each mob

weapon - Variable in class com.tloj.game.entities.Character
 
Weapon - Class in com.tloj.game.collectables
An abstract class that represents a weapon that can be used to attack enemies
Different weapons have different effects that are applied to the target when they are hit
They are also equipped with a Dice that is rolled to determine the damage dealt to the target (in addition to the player's base damage stat).
Weapon(double, int, int) - Constructor for class com.tloj.game.collectables.Weapon
 
Weapon(double, int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.tloj.game.collectables.Weapon
 
WEAPON_SHARD - Static variable in class com.tloj.game.utilities.Constants
 
WeaponEffect - Class in com.tloj.game.collectables.weaponeffects
An abstract class representing an effect that can be applied to a weapon
As with the MobAbility class, this class applies an adaptation of the Strategy pattern to the weapon effects, allowing for easy addition of new effects
This class is meant to be extended by specific weapon effects, guaranteeing modularity
WeaponEffect(Weapon) - Constructor for class com.tloj.game.collectables.weaponeffects.WeaponEffect
